channel.title: Hootsuite on Innovation Unboxed
channel.description: Recent content in Hootsuite on Innovation Unboxed

item.title: Social media on a shoestring
item.description: We better accept it! Free stuff is irresistible, and even more so, if it helps us with social media. Here are a few of our suggestions of the available tools to help you make the most of social media. Social Mention This tool is a search engine, and it includes features such as what keywords have more performance in social media. If you ever wanted to discover the most used hashtags, then this can make your dream come true.
